text: 7.15: Ro 12.18; 14.19; Hi 12.14Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma o mbik guigira Zisas khothɨgi fhu, anan muuŋ o man guigira Zisas khothɨgi, ana ana thamtha za mbui, ana fhura ana ganɨrim, ana ŋgɨri. Maaŋ muuŋgip, mba tɨv hɨrga, guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma o mbik maaŋ muuŋgip guigira Zisas khothɨgi fhuv guma o mbiga tɨgi, mani bɨnan ki fara muuŋgi fhuvara. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme nza wari tɨgɨp ndava bavira kɨr zav nzan kamgi.
